data.title: Commerce Label celebrates 30 years of service
data.meta_description: 'We are thrilled and excited to celebrate 30 years of successful printing and converting services to a wide range of label markets,' states Adam Schafer, vice president of sales at CLI. 'As our product offerings and technologies expand, the entire CLI team remains focused on exceptional service, quality, innovation, environmental consciousness, and unique solutions for challenging applications.' The contemporary look is a registration mark with embedded C for Commerce in 4 color process.
data.text:
'We are thrilled and excited to celebrate 30 years of successful printing and converting services to a wide range of label markets,' states Adam Schafer, vice president of sales at CLI. 'As our product offerings and technologies expand, the entire CLI team remains focused on exceptional service, quality, innovation, environmental consciousness, and unique solutions for challenging applications.'

The contemporary look is a registration mark with embedded C for Commerce in 4 color process.

Bobbi Senske, co-founder at CLI continued with, 'It is exciting to unveil our new CLI corporate logo. Our new logo embodies precision in our products and confidence in our services, which has been the cornerstone of our brand for 30 years strong.'
